#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int rev(int x)
{
    int res=0,tmp;
    while(x>0)
    {
        res= (res<<1)+(res<<3)+x%10;
        x/=10;
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    short t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        x=rev(x); y=rev(y);
        x=x+y;
        cout<<rev(x)<<endl;
    }
}
